description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis – Learn How To Enjoy Your Life With Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • 1. What happens when you don't enjoy your life? a. You miss on life's beautiful moments b. You fail to enjoy the events and occasions c. You don't enjoy the company of your loved ones d. You fail to acknowledge the beauty of life 2. Why most people fail to enjoy their lives? a. Lack of motivation b. Lack of enthusiasm c. Depression d. Stress or anxiety e. Nervousness f. Always staying in the past g. Thinking about the past failures 3. How Self Hypnosis Can Help? 1) Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down 2) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude 3) Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

This course is for those who want to overcome depression and sadness in their life by living with a very positive attitude and not letting the negativity around them affect their daily and professional life . It is for everyone who want to live and enjoy their life to the fullest.

It is also very helpful for people who want to get over depression , anxiety , insomnia , negativity and stress.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonus.

This course contains-

Lecture 1: Introduction

Lecture 2: Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3: Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4: How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5: How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6: Guided Visualization Exercise: To Enjoy Life Fully

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis – Learn How To Enjoy Your Life With Self Hypnosis
